instagram.caption:
Let's Go OUT OUT This Christmas ‚ú®üéÑ

Dear boy, let me tell you something the ancestors and IVOR Cummings would want you to know: the festive season doesn't have to mean isolation.

This December, we're opening 25 windows of Black queer joy across the UK. From World AIDS Day Weekend to Queer Edge Late, from wellness workshops to creative gatherings - we're creating space for connection, celebration, and community.

Because our joy is revolutionary. Our gathering is resistance. And our community is liberation.

üéÅ 25 days of events
üåç London, Manchester, Birmingham, Bristol & beyond
üíõ For and by Black queer men in the UK
üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà Safe spaces, no racism, all welcome
